svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net"><diagram name="6 Failure Modes" id="failure-6modes"><mxGraphModel dx="2000" dy="1800" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="2000" pageHeight="1800" math="0" shadow="0"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 201px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 32px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(17, 24, 39); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

switch.text: Failure Mode Anatomy: How RAG Breaks Down (6 Patterns)

div.div: Each mode shows the step-by-step sequence from query to failure, with color-coded progression

switch.text: Each mode shows the step-by-step sequence from query to failure, with color-coded progression

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1410px; margin-left: 351px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div: Key Insight: Each failure mode requires a specific solution. No single technique solves all six patterns.

switch.text: Key Insight: Each failure mode requires a specific solution. No single technique solves all six patterns.
